attributes.action: In the absence of a General Election, demand individual MPs trigger by-elections
attributes.background: Government & Parliament is showing a complete inability to govern & lack of democratic legitimacy. In the absence of The Government calling a General Election we ask MPs from all parties to trigger individual by-elections en-masse, to resolve the crisis & restore democratic accountability/legitimacy

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for individual MPs and not the UK Government and Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
